articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Vietnamese Delegation 
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the head of a delegation of the Vietnamese Foreign Ministry on a visit to Korea. 
 The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by head of the delegation Le Van Bang, vice-minister of the Vietnamese Foreign Ministry, on October 2

Members of Mongolian Embassy Help Farmers
articles.content:
Members of Mongolian Embassy Help Farmers 
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Janchivdorjyn Lomvo, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy helped members of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Co-operative Farm in harvesting on Oct. 20.
 During the break they conversed with them, deepening the friendship.    
 Members of the embassy conveyed aid materials to the farm.  
.

articles.title: Message of Condolence to President of Mauritania
articles.content:
Message of Condolence to President of Mauritania 
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, yesterday sent a message of condolence to Maaouiya Ould Sid Ahmed Taya, president of Mauritania, over the death of former President Moktar Ould Daddah.
 I express deep condolences to the president, the government, and the people of Mauritania and the bereaved family of the deceased on receiving the sad news that former President Moktar Ould Daddah died of illness, the message said.
